title: Add attestation verification utility
description:
Optional utility function:
- verifyOAuthAttestation(result, keyServerPubKey): boolean
- Verify Ed25519 signature over responseHash
- Can be used by consuming apps to verify DAHR attestation
close_reason: Implemented verifyAttestation and verifyOAuthAttestation utilities with 14 passing tests covering signature verification, expiration, key matching, and error handling

title: Align Demos RPC defaults and EVM tests
Implement KeyServerClient class
description:
Create src/keyserver/KeyServerClient.ts with:
- Constructor: { endpoint: string, nodePubKey: string }
- getProviders(): Promise<string[]>
- initiateOAuth(service, options?): Promise<OAuthInitResult>
- pollOAuth(state): Promise<OAuthPollResult>
- verifyOAuth(service, options): Promise<OAuthVerificationResult> (convenience wrapper with polling loop)
close_reason: KeyServerClient implemented with all methods: getProviders, initiateOAuth, pollOAuth, verifyOAuth

title: Add OAuth types to SDK
description:
Create src/keyserver/types.ts with:
- OAuthService type ("github" | "discord")
- OAuthInitOptions, OAuthInitResult
- OAuthPollResult, OAuthUserInfo
- OAuthVerifyOptions, OAuthVerificationResult
- DAHRAttestation
- OAuthError class

title: Key Server OAuth Integration
description:
Implement KeyServerClient for OAuth verification with DAHR attestation. Enables dApps to verify user ownership of GitHub/Discord accounts through the Key Server OAuth flow.

Architecture: SDK → Node RPC → Key Server (same host, no signatures needed)

Reference: docs/key-server-integration-spec.md
close_reason: All 5/5 tasks complete: types, errors, KeyServerClient, exports, tests, and attestation verification utility. 30 passing tests total.

comments.author: tcsenpai
comments.text: Reopening to close properly - all 5/5 tasks now complete

title: Add KeyServerClient tests
description:
Create src/tests/keyserver/keyserver.spec.ts with:
- Mock Key Server responses
- Test initiateOAuth flow
- Test pollOAuth status transitions
- Test verifyOAuth convenience method
- Test error handling (expired, denied, provider error)
- Test timeout behavior
close_reason: Created comprehensive test suite with 16 passing tests covering all KeyServerClient methods and error scenarios
